Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/California
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, California, Irving Park, Kedzie, and Montrose, due to police activity near Montrose/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Montrose, California, Irving Park, Kedzie, and Montrose, due to police activity near Montrose/California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train near Belmont. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train near Belmont. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
